DOC.criteria: No smoker BMI 20 35 kg/m2 Moderate physical activity Safety medical consultation Feeding behavioural phenotype ( Dutch Eating Questionnaire , Three Eating Factor Questionnaire ) Medical history may affect glucose metabolism ( diabetes , renal hepatic failure , thyroid dysfunction , Cushing syndrome , acromegaly… ) Medical history affect nutrient absorption ( gastrointestinal pancreatic disease , gastrectomy , colectomy… ) Drug use last two month could affect glucose metabolism ( steroid , topical gastric preparation , anorectic drugs… ) Eating disorder Claustrophobic subject
